1. Create a File - PPT / Word doc/PDF 

2.Convert the file to Base64 format using below link

https://base64.guru/converter/encode/file

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Kibana Dev Tools Commands
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Go to Kibana dev tools and create the Ingest Pipeline as below


PUT _ingest/pipeline/attachment
{
  "description" : "Extract attachment information",
  "processors" : [
    {
      "attachment" : {
        "field" : "data"
      }
    }
  ]
}

2. Create Index in Elasticsearch using Kibana dev tools and provide the base64 output format of the file under data as below ,after running below request index will be created with one document with an id "my_id"

PUT sampleindex/_doc/my_id?pipeline=attachment
{
  "filename":"sample.doc",
  "data": ""
}


---------------------------------------------------------------

Searching Index with Keywords

---------------------------------------------------------------
GET sampleindex/_search
{
  "_source": {
    
    "excludes": [ "data" ]
  },
  
  "query": {
    "query_string": {
      "query": "sample",
      "default_field": "attachment.content"
    }
  }
}

GET /_search?
{
   "query": {
     "match": {
       "attachment.content":"sample"
       
     }
     
   }
  
}
